field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the user account.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the unique username for the user.

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password for the user. Minimum is 8 characters.

field.label: Encryption Key
field.help: Set the encryption key to secure the connection between client and this host. Minimum is 8 characters.

field.label: Allow Write Access
field.help: This will enable write access in addition to read-only.
